com.adidas.ui.validator.guide

Class CardNumberGuide

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adidas.ui.validator.guide.CardNumberGuide
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Guide<java.lang.String>

    public class CardNumberGuide
extends java.lang.Object
implements Guide<java.lang.String>
    Class responsible for providing information/error messages for a #ICardNumber depending on the card number provided.
